titleStmt.title: Serious observations lately made, touching his Majesty Charles the Second, King of England, Scotland,France & Ireland. King Charles Stuart, in Hebrew thus: [Hebrew] translated into English, is thus, the King hath prepared a refreshing, hee hath crushed it out of the rock by degrees. Published to inform the people, per H. Walker. S.S.T.S.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Henry, Ironmonger.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R.I. and are to bee sold by William Gilbertson at the Bible in Gilt-spur-street,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Aug: 6"; following "Walker" in author statement: "Ironmonger".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
